alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Logan County; Morgan County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 30 at 3:16AM MST until January 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills ongoing. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado including Denver and Greeley. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM MST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
